Row.Text: Settlers may found cities on Coastal and Ocean tiles beginning in the Industrial Era. (Default is Modern Era.)
Embarked Settlers may found cities on Coastal and shallow Ocean tiles.

Embarked settlers may now found cities on Coastal and shallow Ocean tiles! While embarked, settlers will move slowly as they must transport additional material to construct underwater habitats. Ocean cities can extract more food and gold from sea tiles, are more resistant to nuclear strikes, and build better ships than land-based cities.
Denotes a city founded on a Coast or Ocean Tile.
+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food on Sea Plots. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Sea Resources. Naval Units: +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +15 XP. City takes 20% less damage from nuclear strikes.
